userSettingsPage.formDescription: Add or remove users from your organization
userSettingsPage.selectModeDescription: Select the user you want to associate with your company
userSettingsPage.newModeDescription: Enter your email address to access your account.
userSettingsPage.createUserFormDescription: Enter your email address to access your account.
userSettingsPage.assignUserFormDescription: Choose whether you want to add a new user or assign an existing one.
userSettingsPage.newUserDescription: Create a profile from scratch and assign permissions.
userSettingsPage.existingUserDescription: Select a user who is already part of a company.

companiesPage.formDescription: With this information, we will personalize your experience and better organize your hiring processes.
companiesPage.descriptionPlaceholder: E.g., We provide technological solutions for agriculture
companiesPage.companySizeLabel: How many employees does your company have?
companiesPage.missingInfoTitle: You haven't entered your company information yet!
companiesPage.missingInfoDescription: Completing this information will help us personalize the experience and better organize your processes. It's quick and easy.
companiesPage.selectImageLabel: Select an image from your computer

signIn.formDescription: Enter your email to access your account.

validationErrors.companyDescriptionError: Description must be at least 10 characters long.
validationErrors.companyWebsiteError: Please enter a valid website URL.
validationErrors.companyLinkedinError: Please enter a valid LinkedIn profile URL.

otpPage.formHeading: Confirm your identity with the code we sent.
otpPage.otpInstructions: We sent you a 6 digits code to your email.
otpPage.otpNewCodeMessage: A new code was sent to your email. Please check again.

signUp.companySizeLabel: How many employees does your company have?
signUp.companyRoleLabel: What is your role in the company?
signUp.termsMessage: By clicking "Create my account", you agree to our
signUp.welcomeMessage: Let's build together the future of your team.
signUp.callToActionText: Start now and simplify hiring process.

positionDetailsPage.inProgressTitle: This process can take up to 10 minutes.
positionDetailsPage.inProgressDetails: We are consulting the databases to bring you the best candidates for your vacancy. This process takes a little time to ensure we offer you profiles that best fit your company and the job requirements.
positionDetailsPage.inProgressMessage: You can stay here or continue with other tasks. Don't worry, you'll receive a notification when candidates are available.
positionDetailsPage.moveToPhaseDialogTitle: Are you sure you want to move the candidate to the next phase?
positionDetailsPage.moveToPhaseDialogInfo: The candidate will move from the current phase to a new stage of the process. You can move forward or backward as needed.
positionDetailsPage.missingFieldsDialogInfo: You still have information pending for this phase.

userCard.candidateMatchLabel: How well does the candidate match the vacancy?
userCard.missingSkillsLabel: Skills that we could not demonstrate in the candidate

positionOfferPage.joinOurTeam: we want you to be part of our innovation team.
positionOfferPage.confirmSkipMessage: Are you sure you want to cancel your application?
positionOfferPage.responseTimeInfo: We will respond to you within 24 hours.
positionOfferPage.disclaimerText: By submitting this form, you agree to our privacy policy and personal data processing. Your data will be used exclusively for recruitment purposes and will not be shared with third parties without your consent.
positionOfferPage.salaryDescriptionStart: Compensation for this role is within the range of
positionOfferPage.salaryDescriptionEnd: annual, based on the candidate's experience and skills.

createPositionPage.pageTitle: How do you want to create this vacancy?
createPositionPage.pageDescription: Choose the option that best suits your process. You can generate the job posting using artificial intelligence, create it manually, or duplicate an existing one.
createPositionPage.createWithAiDescription: Save time and let AI structure the job opening for you.
createPositionPage.createWithAiDetails: Our assistant will analyze the position and suggest an optimized description, responsibilities, requirements, and benefits. Just review, adjust, and publish.
createPositionPage.createManuallyDescription: Take full control and build the job opening from scratch.
createPositionPage.createManuallyDetails: Define every detail, from the description to the requirements and benefits. Ideal if you prefer to customize the job opening from the start.
createPositionPage.copyPreviousDescription: Reuse a job opening you already created and adjust it as needed.
createPositionPage.copyPreviousDetails: Choose an existing job opening as a base. You can modify it before publishing, saving time and maintaining consistency in your offers.
createPositionPage.saveDraftDescription: Are you sure you don't want to continue editing the job description?
createPositionPage.finalConfirmationMessage: Done! We've now gathered all the information needed to create the job. Click "Preview" to review the details. If everything is correct, you can click "Save". Need to make any changes? Just continue typing and we'll adjust what you need.
createPositionPage.salaryDescriptionStart: Compensation for this role is within the range of
createPositionPage.salaryDescriptionEnd: annual, based on the candidate's experience and skills.
createPositionPage.salaryNotSpecified: Salary compensation will be shared during the process.
createPositionPage.cancelEditDialogDescription: Are you sure you want to cancel? There are changes that have not been saved.
